title: Harrison Ford
summary: Harrison Ford (born July 13, 1942) is an American actor. As of 2020, the U.S. domestic box-office grosses of his films total over $5.4 billion with worldwide grosses surpassing $9.3 billion,[1] placing him at No. 7 on the list of highest-grossing domestic box office stars of all time.[2][3] In addition to his box-office success, Ford is also an Academy Award nominee, a four-time Golden Globe nominee, a three-time Saturn Award winner, and the recipient of the AFI Life Achievement Award and the Cecil B. DeMille Award.
